expenses.title: Oops! You don't have any registered expenses this month.
expenses.subtitle: Register the expenses made this month using the (+) button in transactions to check your charts.

incomes.title: Oops! You don't have any registered income this month.
incomes.subtitle: Register the incomes made this month using the (+) button in transactions to check your charts.

monthly.title: Oops! You don't have any registered transactions on your monthly balance yet.
monthly.subtitle: What about start registering the expenses and incomes made this month?

goals.title: Oops! You have no registered goals this month.
goals.subtitle: Improve your finances now!

goal.title: Goal status
goal.text: You can find out if you are close to the goal.

debt.title: Debt
debt.text: It's better to run from debt, isn't it?

email.title: Change my email
email.text: After requesting the change, we will send a confirmation to the new registered email. Until confirmation, your Spendwise account will remain linked to your current email.

pwd.title: Change my password
pwd.text: Tip: If possible, use a password that contains numbers, uppercase, lowercase, and special characters.

signup.title: Sign up
signup.subtitle: to calculate your budget!
signup.name: Name
signup.terms: I agree to the Terms of Use

forgot.title: Forgot password
forgot.subtitle: No worries!
forgot.text: Enter the email address you used to sign up to. We will send you a link to reset your password.

restore.title: Restore Password
restore.subtitle: Make strong password!
restore.one: 1.Password must be at least 8 characters long.
restore.two: 2.Password must contain at least one upper case
restore.three: 3.Password must contain at least one number or special character

first.title: What is Spendwise?
first.text: Spendwise brings together everything from spending, balances, and budgets to your credit score and more. Access your financial life in one powerful site.

second.title: What is our goal?
second.text: Our goal is to help every person live in a financially independent reality.

objf.title: Spend less time worrying and more time

fisrt.title: Calculate your budget
fisrt.text: We give you the opportunity to set goals and calculate your budget. With this you can regularly share behind the process.

second.title: Generate monthly report
second.text: You can create your own weekly/monthly reports. This will help you see the full status of your finance.

third.title: Real-time tracker
third.text: Real-time expense tracking allows you to properly plan your expenses and adapt to changing needs.

tracking.title: Traking your budget up to date
tracking.text: With this site you can monitor your financial status at any time. It is very convenient.

report.title: Generate report
report.text: Based on expenses and income, we will make you a weekly/monthly report. It shows the progress or regression of finance.

objs.title: How Spenwise Works?
objs.text: Simplify your spending decisions without sacrificing the finer things in life, like fancy coffee drinks with hard-to-pronounce names.

first.title: Sign Up for Free
first.text: Start your journey with Sing Up. It's easy—no credit card or commitment required.

second.title: Build Your Budget
second.text: Add your accounts and expenses, set savings targets, and share your budget with loved ones.

third.title: Breathe Easier
third.text: Start feeling confident, content, and secure in your financial life. You might even sleep better.

love.title: How You Spend Your Money.
love.text: Start saving and spending with confidence and clarity.

footer.text: Follow us to get support and lots of great ideas on budgeting.

signup.name: Please enter a valid name
signup.pwd: Password must be at least 8 characters long, contain at least one letter and one number
signup.email: Please enter a valid email address
